entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 10:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -15.0°C
Wind: NW 24 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
